languages.text: "Мы были верны своему решению, но в какой-то момент пророчества становились все темнее и беспокойнее. Кто-то предложил сменить курс, но путь нам со всех сторон перекрывали сжимающиеся тиски бушующего Ша'эиля. И тогда мнения совета разделились. Мой голос... стал решающим в нелегком споре, ибо я верил, что предсказание, пророчащее нам спасение в Просторе, не может лгать".

traits.locale_text: "Мы были верны своему решению, но в какой-то момент пророчества становились все темнее и беспокойнее. Кто-то предложил сменить курс, но путь нам со всех сторон перекрывали сжимающиеся тиски бушующего Ша'эиля. И тогда мнения совета разделились. Мой голос... стал решающим в нелегком споре, ибо я верил, что предсказание, пророчащее нам спасение в Просторе, не может лгать".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."
languages.original_text: "Мы были верны своему решению, но в какой-то момент пророчества становились все темнее и беспокойнее. Кто-то предложил сменить курс, но путь нам со всех сторон перекрывали сжимающиеся тиски бушующего Ша'эиля. И тогда мнения совета разделились. Мой голос... стал решающим в нелегком споре, ибо я верил, что предсказание, пророчащее нам спасение в Просторе, не может лгать".

Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of the raging Sha'eil was blocking our way on all sides. It was then that the council's opinions were split. My vote... was the decisive one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «Nos mantuvimos firmes en nuestra decisión, pero llegó un momento en que las predicciones se tornaron aún más siniestras e inquietantes. Alguien propuso que modificásemos el rumbo, pero las garras del proceloso Sha'eil obstruían nuestro camino en todas direcciones. La opinión del consejo estaba dividida. Mi voto... fue el decisivo en aquel controvertido debate, pues me resistía a creer que la profecía que auguraba nuestra salvación en la Extensión fuese una mentira».
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: «Nos mantuvimos firmes en nuestra decisión, pero llegó un momento en que las predicciones se tornaron aún más siniestras e inquietantes. Alguien propuso que modificásemos el rumbo, pero las garras del proceloso Sha'eil obstruían nuestro camino en todas direcciones. La opinión del consejo estaba dividida. Mi voto... fue el decisivo en aquel controvertido debate, pues me resistía a creer que la profecía que auguraba nuestra salvación en la Extensión fuese una mentira».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「我々は下した決定を守っていたが、ある時から予言はますます暗く不穏なものになっていった。誰かが進路の変更を提案したが、荒れ狂うシャーエイルの襲来で我々の道はすべて塞がれてしまった。評議会の意見はそこで二分した…そして私の票が…その困難な議論においての決定打となった。なぜなら、エクスパンスでの救済を約束した予言が嘘であるはずがないと、私は信じていたからだ」
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: 「我々は下した決定を守っていたが、ある時から予言はますます暗く不穏なものになっていった。誰かが進路の変更を提案したが、荒れ狂うシャーエイルの襲来で我々の道はすべて塞がれてしまった。評議会の意見はそこで二分した…そして私の票が…その困難な議論においての決定打となった。なぜなら、エクスパンスでの救済を約束した予言が嘘であるはずがないと、私は信じていたからだ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “我们贯彻着我们的决定，但接下来的预言却变得越来越阴暗，越来越令人不安。有人提议改变航线，但狂怒的纱芮尔从四面八方封锁了我们的航路。那个时候，议会的意见出现了分歧。而我的投票……在那场艰难的辩论中起到了决定作用。我坚信我们的诺言，坚信我们会在科罗努斯扩区获得救赎，坚信这一切不可能是谎言。”
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: “我们贯彻着我们的决定，但接下来的预言却变得越来越阴暗，越来越令人不安。有人提议改变航线，但狂怒的纱芮尔从四面八方封锁了我们的航路。那个时候，议会的意见出现了分歧。而我的投票……在那场艰难的辩论中起到了决定作用。我坚信我们的诺言，坚信我们会在科罗努斯扩区获得救赎，坚信这一切不可能是谎言。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Nous nous en sommes tenus à notre décision, mais les prophéties sont alors devenues encore plus sombres, plus perturbantes. Quelqu'un a proposé de modifier la trajectoire, mais le Sha'eil nous avait pris au piège de toutes parts, nous étions bloqués. C'est alors que les avis du conseil se sont partagés. Mon vote... était décisif dans ce débat épineux, car je pensais que la prophétie qui nous avait promis le salut dans les Étendues ne pouvait pas être un mensonge. »
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous en sommes tenus à notre décision, mais les prophéties sont alors devenues encore plus sombres, plus perturbantes. Quelqu'un a proposé de modifier la trajectoire, mais le Sha'eil nous avait pris au piège de toutes parts, nous étions bloqués. C'est alors que les avis du conseil se sont partagés. Mon vote... était décisif dans ce débat épineux, car je pensais que la prophétie qui nous avait promis le salut dans les Étendues ne pouvait pas être un mensonge. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Wir blieben bei unserer Entscheidung, aber die Prophezeiungen wurden immer düsterer und beunruhigender. Es kam der Vorschlag, unseren Kurs zu ändern, aber Sha'eils war erzürnt und seine feste Umklammerung sorgte dafür, dass wir nirgends anders hinkonnten. Der Rat war zu diesem Zeitpunkt gespalten. Meine Stimme ... setzte sich bei dieser schwierigen Frage durch, da ich mir absolut sicher war, dass die Prophezeiung keine Lüge sein konnte – uns wurde in der Ausdehnung Erlösung versprochen."
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: "Wir blieben bei unserer Entscheidung, aber die Prophezeiungen wurden immer düsterer und beunruhigender. Es kam der Vorschlag, unseren Kurs zu ändern, aber Sha'eils war erzürnt und seine feste Umklammerung sorgte dafür, dass wir nirgends anders hinkonnten. Der Rat war zu diesem Zeitpunkt gespalten. Meine Stimme ... setzte sich bei dieser schwierigen Frage durch, da ich mir absolut sich war, dass die Prophezeiung keine Lüge sein konnte – uns wurde in der Ausdrehnung Erlösung versprochen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Kararımızın arkasında dursak da kehanetler daha da karanlık ve tedirgin edici bir hâl almaya başladı. Birisi rotayı değiştirmeyi önerdi ancak öfke saçan Sha'eil ile aramızdaki mesafenin kapanması, ilerleyişimizi tamamen durdurdu. Sonra da konsey fikir ayrılığına düştü. O zorlu tartışmayı karara bağlayan oy da... Benimkiydi. Enginlik'te bize kurtuluş vadeden o kehanetin yalan olamayacağına inanıyordum."
languages.original_text: "We stood by our decision, but there came a point where the prophecies became ever darker and more unsettling. Someone proposed altering the course, but the closing grip of raging Sha'eil was blocking our path on all sides. It was then that the council's opinion was split. My vote... was the deciding one in that difficult debate, for I believed that the prophecy that had promised us salvation in the Expanse could not have been a lie."

traits.locale_text: "Kararımızın arkasında dursak da kehanetlerin daha da karanlık ve tedirgin edici bir hâl aldığı noktaya geldik. Birisi rotayı değiştirmeyi önerdi ancak öfke saçan Sha'eil ile aramızdaki mesafenin kapanması, her yönden yolumuzu engelliyordu. Ardından konseyin ayrılma fikri öne sürüldü. Benim oyum... O zorlu tartışmayı karar bağlayan oy oldu. Çünkü Enginlik'te bize kurtuluş vadeden o kehanetin yalan olamayacağına inanmıştım."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
